title: Succeeding At Failure: Brother Chopped Off Sister's Hair, It Turned Out To Be Chic Hairstyle
text:
Brothers and sisters get in all kind of tussles, more often than not, one of the two end up getting hurt. For some reason a three-year-old boy - Colt - was playing his sister’s hairdresser and he hacked off the hair on her head. Thankfully for her, he actually ended up creating a chic and stylish look.

When Breana Naylor and her husband Michael noticed that their kids had suddenly gone quiet, they went to check on them and found the two in a closet with the girl surrounded by chunks of her hair and the boy holding a pair of scissors.

Luckily their neighbor Jen Bullock who is a hairdresser fixed the little girl’s hair and frankly we can’t complain. It's a look and little Kimber is carrying it off really well.

Kennedy News And Media

Breana reportedly said, “When I saw them I was shocked, but I thought it was funny. I started laughing. My husband came in and he was a little angry at first - until he found the humor in it too. He was upset, at first, that his little girl's hair was now all scattered over the floor. Colt had definitely had a good hack away at her hair, but Jen came to the rescue. I'm not sure if Kimber is more spunky now because of her hair, or if her hair now matches her personality. I think the hair definitely suits her more now.”

Colt’s punishment? “We had him vacuum up the hair that he'd cut off. I think he's learned his lesson - he won't be doing it again.”

Well, that’s a successful fail.
